programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog) S2 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2) S2 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2»Animated series about the classic children's character. Paddington is a charming young bear that has come from deepest, darkest Peru to live with the Brown family in London. Now that England is his home, there are a lot of new things for this curious bear to learn and Paddington's inquisitive nature takes him on some exciting adventures. Paddington is a kind and friendly kind of guy who is always willing to help. And even though his efforts to lend a hand often result in chaos and mess, Paddington's heart is always in the right place. He will do anything for his friends and family ? all he needs is a delicious marmalade sandwich to keep his energy up! Featuring the voices of Ben Whishaw and Morwenna Banks.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Meteor Shower) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Meteor Shower»Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vente de charité) S2 (19/52)
programme.desc: «La vente de charité»Peppa and George want to go to the playground with Papa and Mama Pig. But a fog sets in and they get lost. When Papa Pig thinks they are back home, the fog clears and they are... in the playground!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Tous à la piscine) S2 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Tous à la piscine»Peppa and George learn to swim, just like Kelly and Karel Konijn. And that swimming is fun through all your life, Papa Pig shows.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (La vie en Arctique) S3 (9/26)
programme.desc: «La vie en Arctique»Brrrr! The Arctic sure is cold?probably because it's filled with so many cool animals! After meeting Arctic Dan, Gil embarks on an icy expedition. With the Guppies' help, can Gil brave the elements to reach the North Pole?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une berceuse pour Blue) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Une berceuse pour Blue»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue a beaucoup d'imagination) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Blue a beaucoup d'imagination»Imagine along with Josh and Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue envisions a mysterious shape to be. We listen to a story created by Slippery, Magenta and Tickety and help Mr. Salt discover his own imagination!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (La malédiction du faucon doré / L'île aux objets perdus) S1 (14/21)
programme.desc: «La malédiction du faucon doré / L'île aux objets perdus»Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place. // When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Chicken Abuelo) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Chicken Abuelo»Tomás accidentally turns Abuelo into a chicken!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Filouland) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Filouland»Shadowland: Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. (S1, ep 10a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le défi du requin) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le défi du requin»Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (La musique et Paddington) S2 (21/27)
programme.desc: «La musique et Paddington»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'orage) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'orage»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le lavage de la voiture) S1 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le lavage de la voiture»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le déjeuner) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le déjeuner»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Blue Butterfly) S1 (n°73)
programme.desc: «The Blue Butterfly»The Blue Butterfly: Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. (S1, ep 73).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Atchoum !) S1 (74/78)
programme.desc: «Atchoum !»Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue est triste) S1 (6/17)
programme.desc: «Blue est triste»Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from her school deal with emotions and feelings in different situations.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les bulles extraterrestres) S8 (14/24)
programme.desc: «Les bulles extraterrestres»Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf»Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla) S1 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla»Mr. Steel does not want to get out of bed and has Professor Sketch build a gigantic pair of sunglasses to block the sun. During a parade, Mr. Steel inflates his balloon in such a way that it disrupts the entire city.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons huisdierhotel / Paddington gaat golfen) S2 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons huisdierhotel / Paddington gaat golfen»Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. // Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says and how should you hold a club Paddington?

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'Mores / Guacamole) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «S'Mores / Guacamole»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires / Détective Baby Shark) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires / Détective Baby Shark»When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Present) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «The Present»The Present: Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mummy Shark. (S1, ep 15b).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Apple Picking) S1 (n°49)
programme.desc: «Apple Picking»The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Giant Strawberry) S1 (n°75)
programme.desc: «The Giant Strawberry»When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La princesse fatiguée) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «La princesse fatiguée»Papa Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a sleepy princess. In the story Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mama Pig is the queen and Papa Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques d'eau de mer) S2 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques d'eau de mer»Granny Pig et Grandpa Pig ont emmené Peppa et George à la plage. Les enfants trouvent des flaques d'eau de mer et Peppa vient au secours d'un petit poisson qui était prisonnier de l'une d'elles. Elle le rejette à la mer et entreprend de creuser son propre petit bassin d'eau de mer...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de sortie de Teddy) S2 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de sortie de Teddy»Peppa et George emmènent leurs jouets préférés en pique-nique...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le ballon de George) S4 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Le ballon de George»Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'île au trésor perdu) S5 (1/20)
programme.desc: «L'île au trésor perdu»Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Autoneige Blaze, à la rescousse !) S6 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Autoneige Blaze, à la rescousse !»When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot»When the bees are in need, Bobbi takes action. Bees are important, and without them there are no flowers, no fruit, and no kaki flaps! Kai takes care of the ducklings but gets in trouble when he leaves that task to Robo-Duck.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Rainbow Comet Rush) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Rainbow Comet Rush»Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog) S2 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2) S2 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2»Animated series about the classic children's character. Paddington is a charming young bear that has come from deepest, darkest Peru to live with the Brown family in London. Now that England is his home, there are a lot of new things for this curious bear to learn and Paddington's inquisitive nature takes him on some exciting adventures. Paddington is a kind and friendly kind of guy who is always willing to help. And even though his efforts to lend a hand often result in chaos and mess, Paddington's heart is always in the right place. He will do anything for his friends and family ? all he needs is a delicious marmalade sandwich to keep his energy up! Featuring the voices of Ben Whishaw and Morwenna Banks.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bureau de papa Pig) S2 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Le bureau de papa Pig»Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig's job is... complicated. Peppa and George have a go at each job. They love working at Daddy's office.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île aux pirates) S2 (23/52)
programme.desc: «L'île aux pirates»Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and her friends on a boat trip to pirate island to dig for treasure. Ahhhh ... while they are building a sand castle Grandpa fell asleep on the boat and drifted away ... What now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vente de charité) S2 (19/52)
programme.desc: «La vente de charité»Peppa and George want to go to the playground with Papa and Mama Pig. But a fog sets in and they get lost. When Papa Pig thinks they are back home, the fog clears and they are... in the playground!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Tous à la piscine) S2 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Tous à la piscine»Peppa and George learn to swim, just like Kelly and Karel Konijn. And that swimming is fun through all your life, Papa Pig shows.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (La vie en Arctique) S3 (9/26)
programme.desc: «La vie en Arctique»Brrrr! The Arctic sure is cold?probably because it's filled with so many cool animals! After meeting Arctic Dan, Gil embarks on an icy expedition. With the Guppies' help, can Gil brave the elements to reach the North Pole?

programme.desc: «Une berceuse pour Blue»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.desc: «Chicken Abuelo»Tomás accidentally turns Abuelo into a chicken!

programme.desc: «Filouland»Shadowland: Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. (S1, ep 10a).

programme.desc: «Le défi du requin»Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (La musique et Paddington) S2 (21/27)
programme.desc: «La musique et Paddington»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le rangement) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Le rangement»Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aire de jeu) S1 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'aire de jeu»Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa accroche une photo) S1 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Papa accroche une photo»Papa Pig promises to put up a picture of Peppa and George when Mama Pig is gone. He accidentally damages the wall, so Peppa and George help Papa Pig fix the wall before Mama Pig gets home.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Funny Photo) S1 (n°77)
programme.desc: «The Funny Photo»While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Gift Box) S1 (n°78)
programme.desc: «The Gift Box»The Gift Box: The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. But he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift. (S1, ep 78).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Cache-cache avec Blue) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache avec Blue»Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte»In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo»When Ian is on holidays, Lola takes over as a park ranger for a day, but that is not easy. Mister Staal tries to clean Middenbos with a huge soap machine and creates one big bubble nightmare!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football) S1 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (15/45)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best Fin-Ship Day) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Best Fin-Ship Day»Best Fin-Ship Day: Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever. (S1, ep 17a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Smile Day) S1 (n°53)
programme.desc: «Smile Day»When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (King for a Day) S1 (n°41)
programme.desc: «King for a Day»Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christopher) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super Christopher»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Secrets Box) S1 (n°31)
programme.desc: «The Secrets Box»Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Supermarché) S1 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Le Supermarché»Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mon anniversaire) S1 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Mon anniversaire»It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Emilie Eléphant) S2 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Emilie Eléphant»Emilie Eléphant, une petite nouvelle, vient d'arriver à la garderie. Elle est assez timide...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami de George) S2 (6/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami de George»Après avoir regardé leur émission de télévision préférée, Peppa et George veulent, eux-aussi, devenir des détectives fameux. Papa Pig leur donne un mystère à élucider...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le trésor de pirate) S4 (52/52)
programme.desc: «Le trésor de pirate»Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Jouets turbulents !) S5 (6/20)
programme.desc: «Jouets turbulents !»Blaze and Watts go with AJ and Gabby to their favorite store: a toy store. There they discover a machine that makes toys. The toy machine has a red button that you cannot press. And what does Crusher do?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'île au trésor perdu) S5 (1/20)
programme.desc: «L'île au trésor perdu»Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les Bébés Tortues de Mer / La baleine échouée) S1 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Les Bébés Tortues de Mer / La baleine échouée»102A - PUPS SAVE THE SEA TURTLES The PAW Patrol pups are playing at the beach when they discover - SEA TURTLE HATCHLINGS! - But the turtles have no way to cross the road and get to the water. Ryder and pups must make them a safe route to the bay. 102B - PUPS AND THE VERY BIG BABY A baby whale has beached itself in Adventure Bay and Ryder and PAW Patrol race to the rescue. With the help of the PAW Patrol the baby whale makes it to the water's edge and swims out to his Mom. Good job Paw Patrol!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pop Pop Boogie / La Lumière du Phare) S1 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Pop Pop Boogie / La Lumière du Phare»104A - PUP PUP BOOGIE The PAW Patrol must work quickly to fix the tracks and remove a train car at the Adventure Bay Train Station, before the next train comes. But when Rubble hurts his PAW, Ryder has to teach Chase how to use Rubble's digger using some moves from the pups favorite dance game PUP PUP BOOGIE!104B - PUPS IN THE FOG When the bulb in the Adventure Bay lighthouse goes out, Ryder and the PAW Patrol battle the clock and thick fog as they try to fix the light in time to get their good friend Cap'n Turbot back home safely.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Kai Express / Ducknado) S1 (4/15)
programme.desc: «Kai Express / Ducknado»When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.
